pages.text: $(li)The Snail Shell Chestplate has more durability than the $(l:patchouli:armors/crocodile_chestplate)Crocodile Chestplate$(/l), but it offers less protection.$(br)$(li)When Sneaking while you are wearing this chestplate, you will receive very little damage.

pages.name: Snail Shell Chestplate
pages.text: from incoming attacks, and you will not be pushed too far by other creatures because the Knockback Resistance obtained.
